title: Royal review 1962
brief_description: Covers many colorful occasions in the Royal calendar for 1962, including the Trooping the Color Ceremony, the 16th Royal Film Performance, Independence celebrations in Jamaica, Trinidad and Uganda, the Chelsea Flower Show, the opening of the new Commonwealth Institute in London and HRH the Duke of Edinburgh’s tour of South America.
